column5: Welcome to a privately owned well-stocked, clean and comfortable front condo with a balcony facing the beach and overlooking the pool! It's my personal getaway with beautiful grounds, two pools, two hot tubs, and easy beach access. It's perfect for small families and couples within walking distance to beach and Seawall shops and restaurants. I am flexible with check-in and out times depending upon other bookings, so let me know when you can drive down!
column8: Sun, Surf, and Sea! Unobstructed Ocean views
